text: Vuga uti “Nimuze mbasomere ibyo Nyagasani wanyu yabaziririje (n’ibyo yabategetse). Ntimukagire icyo mumubangikanya na cyo, mujye mugirira ineza ababyeyi banyu, ntimukice abana banyu kubera ubukene kuko ari twe tubafungurira, mwe na bo. Ntimukegere ibyaha by’urukozasoni, byaba ibikozwe ku mugaragaro cyangwa mu ibanga; kandi ntimukice umuntu Allah yaziririje, keretse ku mpamvu z’ukuri (zemewe n’amategeko). Ibyo yarabibategetse kugira ngo musobanukirwe.”
